前端笔记

    express

    # express

    1 解决跨域问题 npm install cors –-save
    https://github.com/expressjs/corsopen in new window

    2 检测代码变动，不用实时在终端执行node npm install supervisor -g
    https://github.com/petruisfan/node-supervisoropen in new window

    3 静态服务器，随时随地将当前目录变成一个静态文件服务器的根目录 npm install anywhere –g
    https://github.com/JacksonTian/anywhereopen in new window

    4 另一个检查代码变动的工具npm install forever -g
    https://www.jianshu.com/p/669a618f3212open in new window
